BR.name: Word Logic by POWGI
BR.description: Enjoy six brand new POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of games. This time, the games share a common theme of logic and deduction. Kriss Kross The classic word-fit puzzle. Place words into the grid using their length as a guide, and using logic to make sure everything overlaps correctly! Ladders Make new words by changing one letter at a time. Can you turn one word into another in a limited number of steps? Crypto A cipher puzzle (also known as a cryptogram) which reveals a quote when you crack the code! Word Sudoku It's sudoku with words! As an extra clue, one row or column will spell a word. Gaps Several words have one letter missing. Deduce the correct letter to fill in the gaps and spell a new word! Wordsweeper Drawing inspiration from Minesweeper, the clues tell you which letter can be placed in an adjacent square. It's a crossword-style puzzle solved using logic! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!

CA.name: Word Logic by POWGI
CA.description: Purchase this game at full price through Nintendo eShop and get a free digital version of Word Logic by POWGI for Wii U. The same Nintendo Network ID must be linked to your Wii U and Nintendo 3DS systems as well as your eShop account prior to purchase in order to be eligible for the offer. Offer applies to US, Canada, and Mexico only Enjoy six brand new POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of games. This time, the games share a common theme of logic and deduction. Crypto A cipher puzzle (also known as a cryptogram) which reveals a quote when you crack the code! Word Sudoku It's sudoku with words! As an extra clue, one row or column will spell a word. POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!

MX.name: Word Logic by POWGI
MX.description: Compra este juego a precio normal a través de Nintendo eShop y consigue una versión digital gratuita de Word Logic by POWGI para Wii U. Debes vincular el mismo Nintendo Network ID a tus consolas Wii U y Nintendo 3DS, así como a tu cuenta de eShop antes de la compra para poder optar a la oferta.
